title.rendered: NEWTECONS BREAKING GROUND FOR THE FIRST PROJECT OF LUXURY BRAND MARRIOTT IN VIETNAM

content.rendered:
[HCMC, March 24, 2021] The groundbreaking ceremony of Grand Marina, Saigon – the first real-estate project of luxury brand Marriott in Vietnam was solemnly held by international real- estate contractor Masterise Homes at the construction site of the project, No. 2 Ton Duc Thang Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.

Newtecons was honoured to accompany Masterise Homes in the role of Main Contractor of this super project. Grand Marina, Saigon included an apartment project with two brands of Marriott and JW Marriott, this project is also a master-planned complex with a large public park, riverside walkways, and a high-class marina, reaches the mission of a super project located in the most favourable position in Saigon.

Mr. Jason Turnbull – Deputy Managing Director cum Chief Financial Officer of Masterise Homes shared: “We are proud to be the pioneer to bring the luxury real estate to Vietnam and introduce Grand Marina, Saigon – a project with a global guarantee brand, a legacy left for many future generations, creating world-class architectural works with international quality and worthy experiences, contributing to the prosperity of the community and society”.

With the good cooperation in many previous projects between Newtecons and Masterise Homes, having a rich background of experience in implementing large-scale projects, understanding the strict standards of world-class projects, Newtecons commits to manage and implement the project under safety, high quality, and on schedule.

Luxury Real Estate Project – Grand Marina, Saigon has a favorable location on the banks of the maleficent Saigon River. The groundbreaking ceremony is an important milestone, marking the beginning of the journey to create a new symbol of Ho Chi Minh City and Vietnam, this city is becoming the new commercial and cultural center of the whole region, enhance its position and prestige in the international arena.

With an area of up to 10 hectares, it owns an 850m-long wooden promenade winding around the historic river, public green gardens that are cared for and artistically shaped, and masterpiece buildings. Architecture, Grand Marina, Saigon itself is a world with a completely different top-class living only for its residents, bringing together all the world-class relaxation and entertainment facilities.

Mr. Shawn Hill – Senior Vice President – In charge of Asia Pacific, Marriott International said that the Grand Marina project, Saigon will be strictly controlled at every stage from design, construction quality inspection to management after completion according to the strict standards of the world’s largest hotel brand.
